answerText: Dialectic of Enlightenment [or Dialektik der Aufklärung][10] This Frankfurt School author, who also wrote about "the teaching of the good life" in his work Minima Moralia, collaborated with Max Horkheimer on The Dialectic of Enlightenment.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Maryland A + Chicago B | 21 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This book analyzes the demonization of the Catholic Church by Marquis de Sade character's Juliette in the second of two sections called "excursus." For 10 points each: [10] Name this book which prefigures Marshall McLuhan's idea that "the medium is the message" in a section about the title concept "as mass deception," which contains an examination of the "culture industry."
